title: [BUG]
body:
**Description**

We run our Maui release builds currently without Trimming and without AOT. We've had this issue for the past few Visual Studio updates. It did work once some time ago.

The latest VS update hasn't helped.

Out app is production so we are looking to try resolve this ASAP.

**Code**

<PropertyGroup Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(TargetFramework)|$(Platform)'=='Release|net7.0-android|AnyCPU'">
		<PublishTrimmed>True</PublishTrimmed>
		<SuppressTrimAnalysisWarnings>false</SuppressTrimAnalysisWarnings>
		<EnableTrimAnalyzer>True</EnableTrimAnalyzer>
		<RunAOTCompilation>True</RunAOTCompilation>
		<AndroidLinkResources>false</AndroidLinkResources>
		<JavaMaximumHeapSize>2G</JavaMaximumHeapSize>

**Expected Behavior**

Should build and run in release mode on a device

**Actual Behavior**

Endless wait until killing processes manually.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that has the issue -->
- Last known good version:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2022
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - Android: android:minSdkVersion="21"


**Screenshots**

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25628792/210040492-c7bc4365-2d45-49e7-9ae2-bbe499a7e44d.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25628792/210040659-ca85df06-c66a-4fec-bd31-9d6416bce9b5.png)
